mapper.select: select sr_num, sr_writer, sr_title, sr_contents, sr_writingtime, sr_viewcount, sr_image1 as sr_imgname1, sr_image2 as sr_imgname2, sr_image3 as sr_imgname3, sr_image4 as sr_imgname4, sr_image5 as sr_imgname5, sr_price, sr_kind, sr_operatingtime, sr_closed, sr_region, sr_number from showroom

select sr_num, sr_writer, sr_title, sr_contents, sr_writingtime, sr_viewcount, sr_image1 as sr_imgname1, sr_image2 as sr_imgname2, sr_image3 as sr_imgname3, sr_image4 as sr_imgname4, sr_image5 as sr_imgname5, sr_price, sr_kind, sr_operatingtime, sr_closed, sr_region, sr_number from showroom order by sr_writingtime desc limit #{limit}, 12

select sr_num, sr_writer, sr_title, sr_contents, sr_writingtime, sr_viewcount, sr_image1 as sr_imgname1, sr_image2 as sr_imgname2, sr_image3 as sr_imgname3, sr_image4 as sr_imgname4, sr_image5 as sr_imgname5, sr_price, sr_kind, sr_operatingtime, sr_closed, sr_region, sr_number from showroom order by sr_viewcount desc limit #{limit}, 12
mapper.update: update showroom set sr_viewcount=sr_viewcount+1 where sr_num=#{sr_num}
mapper.insert: insert into showroom (sr_writer, sr_title, sr_contents, sr_price, sr_kind, sr_operatingtime, sr_closed,sr_region, sr_number, sr_image1, sr_image2, sr_image3, sr_image4, sr_image5) values (#{sr_writer}, #{sr_title}, #{sr_contents}, #{sr_price}, #{sr_kind}, #{sr_operatingtime}, #{sr_closed}, #{sr_region}, #{sr_number}, #{sr_imgname1}, #{sr_imgname2}, #{sr_imgname3}, #{sr_imgname4}, #{sr_imgname5})
mapper.update: update showroom set sr_title= #{sr_title}, sr_contents= #{sr_contents}, sr_price= #{sr_price}, sr_kind= #{sr_kind}, sr_operatingtime= #{sr_operatingtime}, sr_closed= #{sr_closed}, sr_region= #{sr_region}, sr_number= #{sr_number} where sr_num= #{sr_num}
